sentences.en: Even clemency can go only so far.
sentences.cn: 天大的仁慈也不过如此了.

sentences.en: He appealed to the judge for clemency.
He supplicated the king for clemency.
He was at fault, and he cast himself on her clemency.
sentences.cn: 他有错误, 指望她宽厚地对待他.

sentences.en: I thanked him for his clemency.
I was at fault, and I cast myself on his clemency.
sentences.cn: 我有错误, 指望他宽厚地对待我.

sentences.en: Mercy and truth preserve the king, and his throne is clemency.
sentences.cn: 仁爱和忠诚,是君王的保障; 他的宝座,是赖慈爱而支撑.

sentences.en: Perform meritorious service to atone for one's crimes so as to obtain clemency from the people.
sentences.cn: 立功赎罪,以求得人民的宽恕.

sentences.en: The condemned man petitioned me governor for clemency.
sentences.cn: 被判刑的人上书州长请求慈悲.

sentences.en: The condemned prisoner cowered and began to whimper for clemency.
sentences.cn: 那个被判罪的囚犯抖缩著并开始抽泣请求宽恕.

sentences.en: The judge showed clemency to the prisoner.
The prisoners feel on their knees to beg for clemency.
The republican party has vociferously opposed any clemency for convicted terrorists.
sentences.cn: 共和党已经高声反对给被判有罪的恐怖分子以任何仁慈。

sentences.en: They addressed to the governor a plea for clemency.
sentences.cn: 他们向州长提交了宽刑的申辨书.

sentences.en: Virtues like clemency and empathy are not foreign words for you.
sentences.cn: 宽厚与同情的美德不是你的陌生词汇.

trans.tran_cn: 宽容，仁慈，（尤指气候等）温和
trans.tran_en: forgiveness and less severe punishment for a crime
